content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "browse_website" command to search for top kayaking routes in Norway on the Visit Norway website, but it did not provide any specific information. The website did offer a list of companies offering tours, activities, and transport services throughout Norway. I then used the "list_files" command to see the files in the current directory and found a file called "norway_kayaking.txt" which may have relevant information.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_code", "args": {"code": "import math\\n\\nradius = 5\\narea = math.pi * radius ** 2\\n\\nprint(f\'The area of a circle with a radius of {radius} is {area:.2f}\')", "basename": "circle_area_calculation"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_python_code returned: The area of a circle with a radius of 5 is 78.54\n', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.visitnorway.com/", "question": "What are the top kayaking routes in Norway?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: a webpage for tourism in Norway, offering information on various destinations, activities, and accommodations. It includes a list of companies offering tours, activities, and transport services throughout Norway. However, there is no specific information provided on the top kayaking routes in Norway.\n\nLinks: [' (https://www.visitnorway.com/)', ' (https://www.visitnorway.com/)', 'or search all of Norway (https://www.visitnorway.com/search/?q=)', 'Places to go (https://www.visitnorway.com/places-to-go/)', 'Fjord Norway (https://www.visitnorway.com/places-to-go/fjord-norway/)']", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command list_files returned: ['atlas.yaml', 'atlas.settings.yaml', 'file_logger.txt', 'atlas.json', 'river.txt', 'options.txt', 'river_restoration_techniques.txt', 'river_restoration_summary.txt', 'lake_creation.txt', 'adventures.txt', 'norway_kayaking.txt', 'top_kayaking_routes.txt', 'top_kayaking_routes_sweden.txt', 'Atlas/executed_code/neural_network_tests.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/hello_world.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/print_numbers.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/average.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/test_average.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/circle_area.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/sum_of_naturals.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/factorial.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/my_script.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/my_code.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/circle_area_calculation.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/generate_password.py', 'Atlas/code_files/automate_task.py', 'Atlas/code_files/average.py', 'Atlas/code_files/test_average.py', 'Atlas/text_files/clockify_features.txt', 'Atlas/text_files/clockify_info.txt',
